title: Studio apartments Hammond indiana
posting_body: We have Studio apartments for rent the only utility you pay for is your electric .Heat and water are in included you get bathroom and kitchen,living room/sleep area.

No pets are allowed, 2 people occupency only and we donnot tollerate drugs  We do background checks that are not refundable $60.00 and this is for criminal and credit check.call for more info This building is Under new management.
